0110110111110000 1010010001110001 1 -> sum: 0001001001100010, cout: 1

1010111010110000 1010111001110001 0 -> sum: 0101110100100001, cout: 1
1111100011001010 1010010001001110 1 -> sum: 1001110100011001, cout: 1
0100111010000111 0001010000010100 1 -> sum: 0110001010011100, cout: 0
